faq.title: What are SKB ?
faq.content: Solana Koala Business are 2,500 randomly generated classy koalas on the Solana blockchain. Their goal is to protect the real kSolana Koala Business are 2,500 randomly generated classy koalas on the Solana blockchain. Their goal is to protect the real koalas who are victims of destruction in this world. SKB are categorized by a rarity system based on specific attributes.oalas who are victims of destruction in this world. SKB are categorized by a rarity system based on specific attributes.

faq.title: What is the project goal ?
faq.content: We want to help the koalas by giving part of the funds to a koalas defence association.

faq.title: How can we help Koalas ?
faq.content: A percentage (determined by you) of the funds collected by the mint will be donated to the Australian Koala Foundation and a percentage of the stacking fees will go directly into a pool for them too.

faq.title: When is the launch?
faq.content: We will drop on mid November.  The official date will soon be decided.

faq.title: What is the total supply?
faq.content: A total of 2500 unique classy koalas will be randomly created.

faq.title: What network will this be launched on?
How much does it cost to mint an NFT?
Where can I mint?
faq.content: You will be able to mint your NFT's on a special website. This special website will be released at the last moment to avoid bots.

faq.title: How many can I mint during the sale?
Will my NFT be revealed directly after purchase?
faq.content: Yes! You will be able to see your NFT in your phantom wallet right after you mint it.

faq.title: When will we be able to see rarity and where?
faq.content: 1 hour before the drop on rarity channel.

faq.title: When will we be able to sell our NFT on a marketplace ?
